title: Development of a Methodology Hub for the island of Ireland
abstractText: This proposal is to develop an expert centre in design and analysis of clinical trials (a Methodology Hub). The Hub will support the design and conduct of clinical trials throughout Ireland, and will provide training to staff who are designing clinical trials. This will result in better quality trials, which are more likely to produce correct results. In turn, this will lead to more efficient use of funds and improved healthcare for patients.
